tool_description: This API returns live prices for Gold, Silver, Palladium and Platinum and copper
name: Live Metal Prices API
title: Live Metal Prices API

api_list.name: Chart
api_list.description:
Get chart for all the metals


Parameters:
date (Format YYYY-MM-DD)

api_list.name: Insights
api_list.description: This endpoint returns insights for all the available metals.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-metal-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com/insights"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-metal-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Reports
api_list.description:
Get reports for all the metals


Parameter:
limit (Default: 14)

api_list.name: News
Single Metal
api_list.description:
Get price for only one metal.

Available metal:  'SLV' | 'SI=F' | 'GC=F' | 'PL=F' |  'PA=F' | 'ALI=F' | 'HG=F'

api_list.name: Prices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-metal-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com/metals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-metal-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
